b:includable.b:comment: We don't display labels on the home page.
Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.
Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height }
b:include.name: responsiveImage

a.expr:href: params("https://www.tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool/preview",{canonicalUrl: data:post.url.canonical, caption: data:post.snippet, posttype: "link", title: data:post.title})
params("https://www.tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool/preview",{canonicalUrl: data:post.url.canonical, caption: data:post.snippet, posttype: "link", title: data:post.title})

b:eval.expr: data:post.body snippet {length: 100, linebreaks: false, links: false}

b:includable.b:comment: Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.
